parameters.name: AutoPay
parameters.description: The reserved parameter. This parameter is not supported.

parameters.name: AutoRenew
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the auto-renewal feature. Valid values:
* **true**
* **false**
> *   This parameter is valid only when you change the billing method from pay-as-you-go to subscription.
> *   All strings except **true** are considered **false**.

parameters.name: AutoUseCoupon
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use a coupon. Valid values:
* **true** (default)
* **false**

parameters.name: BusinessInfo
parameters.description: The additional business information about the instance.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The custom client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.
> The value can contain ASCII characters and can be up to 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: The reserved parameter. This parameter is not supported.

parameters.name: IncludeDataDisks
parameters.description: The reserved parameter. This parameter is not supported.

parameters.name: InstanceChargeType
parameters.description: The reserved parameter. This parameter is not supported.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance or disk.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The reserved parameter. This parameter is not supported.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description:
The new billing method of the instance. Valid values:
* **Prepaid**: subscription.
* **Postpaid**: pay-as-you-go.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The renewal cycle of the instance. Valid values:
* **Year**
* **Month**
> This parameter must be specified if you set the PayType parameter to **Prepaid**.

parameters.name: UsedTime
parameters.description:
The subscription duration of the instance.
*   If you set the **Period** parameter to **Year**, the value of the **UsedTime** parameter ranges from **1** to **5**.
*   If the **Period** parameter is set to **Month**, the value of the **UsedTime** parameter ranges from **1** to **11**.

> If you set the **PayType** parameter to **Prepaid**, you must specify this parameter.
